name: construct-prompt
description: Generates a full system prompt for the LLM based on profile summary, current date, user message, and conciseness setting.

profileSummary.description: A summary of the customer's profile, typically generated by interpret-profile.

isConcise.description: If true, instructs the LLM to respond in under 60 words.

prompt.description: A complete LLM system prompt suitable for use with OpenRouter or OpenAI.
